mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SecondhandReply WHERE boardNum = #{baordNum} ORDER BY CASE WHEN replyParents = 0 THEN replyNum ELSE replyParents END, replyNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SecondhandReply(boardNum, replyContent, userID, replyDate, replyGID, replyOrder, replyParents) VALUES(#{boardNum}, #{replyContent}, #{userID}, SYSDATE, #{replyGID, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{replyOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{replyParents, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SecondhandReply WHERE replyNum = #{replyNum} or replyGID = #{replyGID}
